    Description
    static final FacesMessage.Severity
    FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR
    Message severity level indicating that an error has occurred.
    static final FacesMessage.Severity
    FacesMessage.SEVERITY_FATAL
    Message severity level indicating that a serious error has occurred.
    static final FacesMessage.Severity
    FacesMessage.SEVERITY_INFO
    Message severity level indicating an informational message rather than an error.
    static final FacesMessage.Severity
    FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN
    Message severity level indicating that an error might have occurred.

  • Uses of FacesMessage.Severity in jakarta.faces.context

    Methods in jakarta.faces.context that return FacesMessage.Severity
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    abstract FacesMessage.Severity
    FacesContext.getMaximumSeverity()
    Return the maximum severity level recorded on any FacesMessages that has been queued, whether or not they are associated with any specific UIComponent.
    FacesMessage.Severity
    FacesContextWrapper.getMaximumSeverity()
    The default behavior of this method is to call FacesContext.getMaximumSeverity() on the wrapped FacesContext object.
